verbose_text: NO is produced in neurons in response to action potential dependent release of glutamate whose post-synaptic sequestering facilitates the influx of Ca+ + ions through NMDA (N-methyl-D-aspartate) receptors.
evidence: NO is produced in neurons in response to action potential-dependent release of glutamate whose post-synaptic sequestering facilitates the influx of Ca++ ions through NMDA (N-methyl-D-aspartate
